overview:
Joe Adam is the CEO of Zyxio. An experienced senior executive with P&L, marketing, product development and operations experience in high volume products based on disruptive technologies, Joe’s past successes include managerial positions with Digital, Rockwell, Conexant, Skyworks, and Wispry. His last position was VP of Worldwide Assembly Business with Stats ChipPac, a global leading service provider of semiconductor packaging and distribution solutions.

Joe is driven by his passion for building large scale new businesses based on breakthrough technology.
